garage.name: Garage
garage.description: Your garage. Take on customer repair jobs to earn money and increase your reputation.

car_dealership.name: Car Dealership
car_dealership.description: Haven Car Dealership. Buy cars to expand your collection.

drag_strip.name: Drag Strip
drag_strip.description:
Take your cars to the track and test their speed and your reaction time in a drag race, as well as show off what your garage is capable of doing to cars. 
Can choose between practice mode or participate in a race against an opponent.

underground_race_meet.name: Underground Race Meet
underground_race_meet.description: Think your car is good and your driving can match it? Put your money where your mouth and participate in unsanctioned street races with cash buy-ins. Who knows what kind of people you'll be up against, but the risk is worth the reward.
